description: Have you ever wanted to try your hand at designing and building a language, only to be driven away by ancient and obtuse tools? Clojure makes an excellent sandbox for quickly designing and prototyping new language ideas. This talk lays out a roadmap for the aspiring language inventor, from design to parsing to building a runtime.
short_description: Have you ever wanted to try your hand at designing and building a language, only to be driven away by ancient and obtuse tools?

videos.title: Design and Prototype a Language In Clojure

title: Design and Prototype a Language In Clojure
